scripts.prePublish1: cd ./packages/d2-crud-x && npm run build && cd ../d2-crud-plus && npm run build && cd ../../
scripts.afterPublish1: copyfiles ./packages/*/CHANGELOG.md  ./docspress/guide/changelogs/ && npm run docs:build && npm run gitacp
scripts.gitacp: git add -A . &&  git commit -m publish && git push
scripts.publish1: npm run prePublish1 && npm run lerna:publish && npm run copylogs && npm run afterPublish1
